description: This three-and-a-half-acre property on a bluff in Antigua and Barbuda is on the market for $4.25 million.
title: Sweeping Views on the Coast of Antigua
title_page: Sweeping Views on the Coast of Antigua - The New York Times
maintext:
Slide 1 of 12,
This three-and-a-half-acre property, with a three-bedroom house and a one-bedroom cottage on an 80-foot bluff on the Caribbean island of Antigua, is on the market for $4.25 million.
